SEARCH
Package common

Interface EntityStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseManager
public interface EntityStore
Minimal persistence abstraction that hides the concrete CSV-backed storage from high-level code.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    append(String filePath, Entity entity)
    Persists a new entity by appending it to the backing resource.
    void
    delete(String filePath, String id, String entityType)
    Removes the entity identified by id from the backing resource.
    Entity
    findById(String filePath, String id, String entityType)
    Finds the entity identified by id inside the supplied resource.
    List<Entity>
    loadAll(String filePath, String entityType)
    Loads all entities contained in the target resource.
    void
    update(String filePath, String id, Entity entity, String entityType)
    Replaces the entity that matches id inside the backing resource.

  • Method Details

    • loadAll

      List<Entity> loadAll(String filePath, String entityType)
      Loads all entities contained in the target resource.
      Parameters:
      filePath - resource resolved via
      invalid reference 
      PathResolver#resource(String)
      entityType - logical discriminator used by EntityFactoryRegistry
      Returns:
      list of hydrated entities (may be empty when the file is missing)

    • findById

      Entity findById(String filePath, String id, String entityType)
      Finds the entity identified by id inside the supplied resource.

    • append

      void append(String filePath, Entity entity)
      Persists a new entity by appending it to the backing resource.

    • update

      void update(String filePath, String id, Entity entity, String entityType)
      Replaces the entity that matches id inside the backing resource.

    • delete

      void delete(String filePath, String id, String entityType)
      Removes the entity identified by id from the backing resource.
